mapper.select: SELECT id as id, title as title, publisher as publisher, release_department as releaseDepartment, release_date as releaseDate, summary as summary, rich_text as richText FROM oa_corporate_honor ORDER BY release_date desc LIMIT 5

SELECT id as id, title as title, publisher as publisher, release_department as releaseDepartment, release_date as releaseDate, summary as summary, rich_text as richText FROM oa_corporate_honor ORDER BY release_date desc
